title: Did Trump cease to be a member of Costco in this letter?
subtitle: There is a letter that former United States President Donald Trump allegedly sent to Costco, in which he spoke of "the eight-pound tank of coconut groups" and the rutsiri chicken.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: In a letter dated 4 February 2021, former United States President Donald Trump showed that his membership in Costco had been abolished.
